data.eml:eml: Integripelta acanthus n. sp. (Bryozoa: Eurystomellidae) — a tropical prey species of Okenia hiroi (Nudibranchia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gordon, D. P., Rudman, W. B. (2006): Integripelta acanthus n. sp. (Bryozoa: Eurystomellidae) — a tropical prey species of Okenia hiroi (Nudibranchia). Zootaxa 1229: 41-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273434
